description: personal study ID composed by the first authors’ first surname_year of publication_first title word
number of experiment from publication
year the data point was obtained
month the data point was obtained
day of the month the data point was obtained
name of the participant
age presented in years – see metadata for source of age
sex of the participant
species of individuals participating in the study -bonobo/chimpanzee/gorilla/orangutan
species subgroup at time of data collection – WKPRC chimpanzee group a or b/ etc
set of trials - mostly occurring on the same day - usually numerical
separate count for test trials -  that is trials in which one cup was empty
presentation of the experiment to the participants - usually numerical
in testwarmup the experimenter refilled the empty plate -  in test he did not
whether the same or different types of food were on the two plates
food on the left plate
food on the right plate
whether the participant pointed
to which side the participant  pointed
which type of food the participant pointed at
whether the participant pointed to an empty plate
whether the point to an empty plate was directed at the one that previously contained high-quality (hq) or low-quality (lq) food
when both plates were empty -  the experimenter produced a prompt when the participant did not point
